member.name: T:softaware.Cqs.Decorators.FluentValidation.FluentValidationCommandHandlerDecorator`1
member.summary: A decorator for validating the specified command with FluentValidation (https://fluentvalidation.net/). Uses the contructor injected for validating the command. Throws a when the validation fails.

member.name: T:softaware.Cqs.Decorators.FluentValidation.FluentValidationQueryHandlerDecorator`2
member.summary: A decorator for validating the specified command with FluentValidation (https://fluentvalidation.net/). Uses the contructor injected for validating the command. Throws a when the validation fails.
member.typeparam: The type of the query to execute.
The type of the query result.

member.name: T:softaware.Cqs.Decorators.FluentValidation.NullValidator`1
member.summary: Implementation of the "Null Object Pattern". This validator does not validate anything.
